verses.verse: And this is the thing <S%H1697><s%> that you shall do <S%H6213><s%> unto them to hallow <S%H6942><s%> them <S%H3547><s%>, to minister unto me in the priest's office: Take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%> outside blemish <S%H8549><s%>,

And unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, and cakes <S%H2471><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> tempered <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and wafers <S%H7550><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>: of wheat <S%H2406><s%> flour <S%H5560><s%> shall you make them <S%H6213><s%>.

And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> them into one <S%H259><s%> basket <S%H5536><s%>, and bring <S%H7126><s%> them in the basket <S%H5536><s%>, with the bullock <S%H6499><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and shall wash <S%H7364><s%> them with water <S%H4325><s%>.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the garments <S%H899><s%>, and put <S%H3847><s%> upon Aaron <S%H175><s%> the coat <S%H3801><s%>, and the robe <S%H4598><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>, and clothe <S%H640><s%> him with the curious belt <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>:
And you shall put <S%H7760><s%> the turban <S%H4701><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown <S%H5145><s%> upon the turban <S%H4701><s%>.
Then shall you take <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and pour <S%H3332><s%> it upon his head <S%H7218><s%>, and anoint him <S%H4886><s%>.
And you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and put <S%H3847><s%> coats upon them <S%H3801><s%>.

And you shall clothe <S%H2296><s%> them with belts <S%H73><s%>, Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and put <S%H2280><s%> the caps <S%H4021><s%> on them <S%H3550><s%>: and the priest's office shall be theirs for a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> statute <S%H2708><s%>: and you shall consecrate <S%H4390><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>.

And you shall cause a bullock <S%H6499><s%> to be brought <S%H7126><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall put <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%>.
And you shall kill <S%H7819><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, by the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> with your finger <S%H676><s%>, and pour <S%H8210><s%> all the blood <S%H1818><s%> beside <S%H413><s%> the bottom <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covers <S%H3680><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and the membrane <S%H3508><s%> that is above the liver <S%H3516><s%>, and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon them <S%H6999><s%>, and burn them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

But the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and his skin <S%H5785><s%>, and his dung <S%H6569><s%>, shall you burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>: it is a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>.

You shall also take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>; and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall put <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%>.
And you shall kill <S%H7819><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%>, and you shall take <S%H3947><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%>, and sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> it round about <S%H5439><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And you shall cut <S%H5408><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> in pieces <S%H5409><s%>, and wash <S%H7364><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%> of him <S%H3767><s%>, and his legs, and put <S%H5414><s%> them unto his pieces <S%H5409><s%>, and unto his head <S%H7218><s%>.

And you shall burn <S%H6999><s%> the whole ram <S%H352><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>: it is a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: it is a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>; and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall put <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%>.

Then shall you kill <S%H7819><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> of his blood <S%H1818><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the tip <S%H8571><s%> of the right ear <S%H241><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and upon the tip <S%H8571><s%> of the right <S%H3233><s%> ear <S%H241><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and upon the thumb <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and upon the great toe <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> foot <S%H7272><s%>, and sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> that is upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> it upon Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and upon his garments <S%H899><s%>, and upon his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and upon the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him <S%H6942><s%>: and he shall be hallowed, and his garments <S%H899><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>' garments with him <S%H899><s%>.

Also you shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> and the rump <S%H451><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covers <S%H3680><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and the membrane <S%H3508><s%> above the liver <S%H3516><s%>, and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon them <S%H3225><s%>, and the right shoulder <S%H7785><s%>; for it is a ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration <S%H4394><s%>:

And one <S%H259><s%> loaf <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%> of oiled <S%H8081><s%> bread <S%H259><s%>, and one wafer <S%H7550><s%> out of the basket <S%H5536><s%> of the unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>:

And you shall put <S%H7760><s%> all in the hands <S%H3709><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and in the hands <S%H3709><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>; and shall wave <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And you shall receive <S%H3947><s%> them of their hands <S%H3027><s%>, and burn <S%H6999><s%> them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: it is an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s consecration <S%H4394><s%>, and wave <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and it shall be your part <S%H4490><s%>.

And you shall sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%> of the wave offering <S%H8573><s%>, and the shoulder <S%H7785><s%> of the heave offering <S%H8641><s%>, which is waved <S%H5130><s%>, and which is heaved up <S%H7311><s%>, of the ram <S%H352><s%> of the consecration <S%H4394><s%>, even of that which <S%H834><s%> is for Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and of that which is for his sons <S%H1121><s%>:

And it shall be Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s and his sons <S%H1121><s%>' by a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: for it is an heave offering <S%H8641><s%>: and it shall be an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of their peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, even their heave offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be his sons <S%H1121><s%>' after <S%H310><s%> him <S%H4888><s%>, to be anointed in it and to be consecrated in them <S%H4390><s%>.

And that son <S%H1121><s%> that is priest <S%H3548><s%> in his stead shall put <S%H3847><s%> them on seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, when he comes <S%H935><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the holy place <S%H6944><s%>.
And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> of the consecration <S%H4394><s%>, and boil <S%H1310><s%> his flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%>, and the bread <S%H3899><s%> that is in the basket <S%H5536><s%>, by the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And they shall eat <S%H398><s%> those things with which the atonement was made <S%H3722><s%>, to consecrate <S%H4390><s%> and to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them <S%H2114><s%>: but a stranger shall not eat <S%H398><s%> there because they are holy <S%H6944><s%>.

And if anything of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the consecrations <S%H4394><s%>, or of the bread <S%H3899><s%>, remain <S%H3498><s%> unto the morning <S%H1242><s%>, then you shall burn <S%H8313><s%> the remainder <S%H3498><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: it shall not be eaten <S%H398><s%>, because it is holy <S%H6944><s%>.

And thus shall you do <S%H6213><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, according to all things which I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall you consecrate them <S%H4390><s%>.

And you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> every day <S%H3117><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%> for atonement <S%H3725><s%>: and you shall cleanse <S%H2398><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>, when you have made an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for it <S%H4886><s%>, and you shall anoint it <S%H6942><s%>, to sanctify it.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> it <S%H4196><s%>; and it shall be an altar most holy <S%H6944><s%>: whatever touches <S%H5060><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be holy <S%H6942><s%>.

Now this is that which you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> by day <S%H3117><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.

The one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>; and the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> at evening <S%H6153><s%>:

And with the one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> a tenth <S%H6241><s%> deal of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with the fourth part <S%H7253><s%> of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of beaten <S%H3795><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>; and the fourth part <S%H7243><s%> of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> for a drink offering <S%H5262><s%>.

And the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> at evening <S%H6153><s%>, and shall do <S%H6213><s%> thereto according to the food offering <S%H4503><s%> of the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and according to the drink offering <S%H5262><s%> there for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

This shall be a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: where I will proper <S%H3259><s%> you <S%H1696><s%>, to speak there unto you
And there I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and the tabernacle shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> by my glory <S%H3519><s%>.

And I will sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and the altar <S%H4196><s%>: I will sanctify <S%H6942><s%> also both Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, to minister to me in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office.
And I will live <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and will be their God <S%H430><s%>.

And they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>, that brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, that I may live <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>: I am the Lord their God <S%H430><s%>.
